Package controller

Class NotesController

java.lang.Object
controller.NotesController
public class NotesController extends Object
The NotesController class serves as the controller in the MVC pattern for a note-taking application. It mediates between the NotesView and NotesModel, handling user actions initiated in the view and updating the model accordingly. It also updates the view in response to changes in the model's state.

  • Constructor Details

    • NotesController

      public NotesController(NotesModel model, NotesView view)
      Constructs a NotesController with specified model and view. It initializes the controller by attaching view listeners and setting up the initial view state.

      Note: The model is accessed via its singleton instance rather than directly using the passed parameter. This ensures that the controller manipulates the single shared instance of the model.

      Parameters:
      model - The NotesModel instance intended for this application. Not directly used, the singleton instance is instead retrieved internally.
      view - The NotesView instance for this application.

  • Method Details

    • addNote

      public void addNote()
      Adds a new note to the model based on user input from the view. If the input is not empty, it updates the model and clears the input field in the view.

    • getFormattedNotes

      public String getFormattedNotes()
      Formats and returns a string representation of all notes currently stored in the model. The notes are concatenated into a single string, separated by newline characters.
      Returns:
      A formatted string of all notes.

    • enableTouchScreenMode

      public void enableTouchScreenMode()
      Enables touch screen mode in the view. This method provides an interface for the user to interact with the application in a touch screen environment.

    • toggleFullScreen

      public void toggleFullScreen()
      Toggles the full screen mode of the application view. This method allows the user to switch between full screen and windowed mode for the application's interface.

    • getModel

      public NotesModel getModel()
      Returns the NotesModel instance associated with this controller. This method allows access to the model part of the MVC architecture.
      Returns:
      The current NotesModel instance.
